section.p: This is a sample user manual that I created using DITA XML, to demonstrate my technical writing skills in DITA XML and CSS (via Oxygen XML Author).

To provide for a realistic example, I have taken the liberty of replicating content from the original user manual of the
A digital-to-analogue converter (DAC), which converts music stored in digital format (for e.g. MP3s) into an analogue format required for playback using amplifiers and speakers. . I selected this manual as it is well structured and fairly intricate. You can find it here: .

The underlying structure of this sample user manual, however, was developed from the ground up using my understanding and application of DITA XML principles. I have also used CSS to customise the PDF output to approximate the look and feel of the original user manual in most sections.
